title: Response wrong status code for some situation for grpc
description:
ref #11842
The problem:
After client register non-ephemeral, and register ephemeral instance, client will receive payload with NacosRuntimeException. grpc response will get 500 as resultcode and 400 as errorcode。
400 as errocode is right.
500 as result is wrong , this is not consistency with the case with OpenAPI.

I expect the result code would the same with errocode like http code.
description_text:
ref #11842
The problem:
After client  register  non-ephemeral, and register ephemeral instance,  client  will receive payload with NacosRuntimeException. grpc response will get 500 as resultcode  and 400 as errorcode。
400 as errocode is right.
500 as result is  wrong , this is  not  consistency with the case with OpenAPI.
I expect the  result code  would the same with errocode like http code.
